swen221.lab2.util

类 ConwayAbstractRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • swen221.lab2.util.ConwayAbstractRule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Rule
    直接已知子类:
    ConwaysOverpopulationRule, ConwaysReproductionRule, ConwaysUnderpopulationRule

    public abstract class ConwayAbstractRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule
    Implements a standard class for implementing the standard rules for Conway's game of life. Specifically, those based around the number of neighbours which are alive. In the standard game, cell's are either ON or OFF which, in our customizable version of Conway, corresponds to state 0 and state 9.

    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        public int apply(int x,
                 int y,
                 BoardView board)
        从接口复制的说明: Rule
        Apply a given rule to a board to determine the cell's current state.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 Rule
        参数:
        x - The horizontal position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
        y - The vertical position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
        board - The current state of the board
        返回:
        The new state of the cell, or -1 if this rule could not apply.

      • apply

        public abstract int apply(int x,
                          int y,
                          int neighbours)
        Apply the actual rule having already calculated the number of alive neighbours
        参数:
        x - Horizontal position of cell on the board
        y - Vertical position of cell on the board
        neighbours - Number of alive neighbours on the board.
        返回:
